body:
## The problem
zef install p6doc fails on test for Pod-To-HTML

## Error Log
```
:~$ zef install p6doc
===> Searching for: p6doc
===> Updated cpan mirror: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ugexe/Perl6-ecosystems/master/cpan.json
===> Updated p6c mirror: http://ecosystem-api.p6c.org/projects.json
===> Searching for missing dependencies: LWP::Simple:ver<0.101+>, URI, File::Temp, JSON::Fast, Pod::To::BigPage:ver<0.4.0+>, Pod::To::HTML:ver<0.3.17>, OO::Monitors, Test::META
===> Searching for missing dependencies: MIME::Base64, JSON::Tiny, Test::When, META6, File::Directory::Tree
===> Searching for missing dependencies: JSON::Class
===> Searching for missing dependencies: JSON::Marshal, JSON::Unmarshal
===> Searching for missing dependencies: JSON::Name
===> Building: p6doc:ver<1.002>
Failed to create directory '/opt/rakudo-pkg/share/perl6/site/doc' with mode '0o777': Failed to mkdir: 13
  in method build at /home/user1/.zef/store/doc.git/0264be340b33e7d75212a2791ba44ec89099f46b/Build.pm line 12
  in block <unit> at -e line 1

===> Building [OK] for p6doc:ver<1.002>
===> Testing: MIME::Base64:ver<1.2.1>:auth<github:retupmoca>
===> Testing [OK] for MIME::Base64:ver<1.2.1>:auth<github:retupmoca>
===> Testing: URI:ver<0.1.4>
===> Testing [OK] for URI:ver<0.1.4>
===> Testing: JSON::Tiny:ver<1.0>
===> Testing [OK] for JSON::Tiny:ver<1.0>
===> Testing: LWP::Simple:ver<0.103>:auth<Cosimo Streppone>
===> Testing [OK] for LWP::Simple:ver<0.103>:auth<Cosimo Streppone>
===> Testing: File::Directory::Tree:auth<labster>
===> Testing [OK] for File::Directory::Tree:auth<labster>
===> Testing: File::Temp:ver<0.0.6>
===> Testing [OK] for File::Temp:ver<0.0.6>
===> Testing: JSON::Fast:ver<0.9.11>
===> Testing [OK] for JSON::Fast:ver<0.9.11>
===> Testing: Test::When:ver<1.001008>
===> Testing [OK] for Test::When:ver<1.001008>
===> Testing: Pod::To::BigPage:ver<0.4.0>:auth<Wenzel P. P. Peppmeyer>
===> Testing [OK] for Pod::To::BigPage:ver<0.4.0>:auth<Wenzel P. P. Peppmeyer>
===> Testing: Pod::To::HTML:ver<0.3.17>
# Failed test 'no-break space is not converted to other space'
# at t/01-basic.t line 23
# Looks like you failed 1 test of 3
===> Testing [FAIL]: Pod::To::HTML:ver<0.3.17>
Aborting due to test failure: Pod::To::HTML:ver<0.3.17> (use --force-test to override)
  in code  at /home/user1/.perl6/sources/9062A39D0256C0BD797016C3FE93D839191AFE2B (Zef::Client) line 385
  in method test at /home/user1/.perl6/sources/9062A39D0256C0BD797016C3FE93D839191AFE2B (Zef::Client) line 363
  in code  at /home/user1/.perl6/sources/9062A39D0256C0BD797016C3FE93D839191AFE2B (Zef::Client) line 540
  in sub  at /home/user1/.perl6/sources/9062A39D0256C0BD797016C3FE93D839191AFE2B (Zef::Client) line 537
  in method install at /home/user1/.perl6/sources/9062A39D0256C0BD797016C3FE93D839191AFE2B (Zef::Client) line 643
  in sub MAIN at /home/user1/.perl6/sources/9E04C517E18C976DC9F459E2CE31A87142034020 (Zef::CLI) line 152
  in block <unit> at /home/user1/.perl6/resources/25ADD3DE4D08C272AC81C82BCB2DBE07D909E768 line 3

  in block <unit> at /home/user1/.perl6/bin/zef line 2
```

title: zef install p6doc fails on tests
